name: The puzzler
description:
Hello this is my babys first game
must admit I was trying to work on something bigger, but it was clearly out of my reach, so I did this small game just to test some concepts and to get a better work flow with unity

With time, I hope to actually flesh out this game, but at this moment this is just a small work that I hope is fun

please give me any feed back, even cursing me out does help

Controls 
arrow keys: move and jump
Q: dash
escape: pause

use your mouse for menus 
the options for now only has a slider (that does nothing) and a level select and so does the pause menu, so if you are stuck in a level use that to change it, i did test every level so i know they are possible to beat
Tip: if you're using a spring to jump, if you jump in midair you will slow down
well i think that is all i do hope you have fun
